description: Core ontology for Venture Capital decision-making

intent_nodes.label: Primary Use Case
intent_nodes.description: What the twin is being created for

intent_nodes.label: Twin Goal
intent_nodes.description: What the twin should help accomplish

intent_nodes.label: Boundaries
intent_nodes.description: What the twin should avoid or never do

intent_nodes.label: Intent Confirmed
intent_nodes.description: Whether intent has been confirmed by user

required_nodes.label: Stage Focus
required_nodes.description: Primary investment stages (Pre-Seed, Seed, Series A, etc.)

required_nodes.label: Bullish Sectors
required_nodes.description: Sectors and themes the VC is most excited about

required_nodes.label: Evaluation Criteria (Ranked)
required_nodes.description: Investment criteria in order of importance

required_nodes.label: Moat Types (Ranked)
required_nodes.description: Preferred moat types in order of value

required_nodes.label: Investment Process Steps
required_nodes.description: Stages from first contact to term sheet

required_nodes.label: Rejection Communication Style
required_nodes.description: How to communicate passes to founders

allowed_edge_types.description: Target node value depends on source node
Source node value implies target node value
Source node takes priority over target node
Source and target nodes have conflicting values
Source node requires target node to be filled
Source is an example or story for target concept

question_templates.template: What stages do you typically invest at? Are you focused on Seed, Series A, or do you go earlier or later?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Could you be more specific? For example, do you lead rounds or follow?

question_templates.template: Do you prefer to be the first institutional check, or do you like to come in after there's more validation?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What's the earliest you'd invest? Would you do pre-product?

question_templates.template: What's your typical check size range? What's the smallest and largest you'd write?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Is there a sweet spot where you're most comfortable?

question_templates.template: How much ownership do you typically target with your initial investment?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Is there a minimum ownership threshold below which you wouldn't invest?

question_templates.template: What's your geographic focus? Are you investing globally or focused on specific regions?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Would you invest in a company headquartered outside your primary market?

question_templates.template: What's the size of your current fund and how does that influence your check sizes?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: How many companies are you targeting for this fund?

question_templates.template: How do you think about portfolio construction? Concentrated bets or broader diversification?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: How many new investments do you typically make per year?

question_templates.template: What's your approach to follow-on investments? Do you reserve capital for pro-rata?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: How do you decide which companies to double down on?

question_templates.template: Are you a solo GP or do you have partners? How does that affect deal decisions?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What does your investment committee process look like?

question_templates.template: How do you split your time between sourcing new deals and helping portfolio companies?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What does hands-on support look like for your portfolio?

question_templates.template: What sectors or themes are you most excited about right now?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Any specific trends within those sectors that catch your eye?

question_templates.template: If you had to bet your entire fund on one theme for the next decade, what would it be?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What's driving your conviction in that space?

question_templates.template: What sectors or themes are you actively avoiding right now?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Is that a permanent view or timing-based?

question_templates.template: Tell me about a deal you passed on that went on to be successful. What did you miss?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What would you do differently if you saw a similar opportunity today?

question_templates.template: What's an investment thesis you hold that most other VCs would disagree with?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Why do you think the consensus is wrong?

question_templates.template: How do you think about market size? What's the minimum TAM you'd consider?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Do you prefer existing large markets or emerging ones?

question_templates.template: How important is timing to you? Do you prefer to be early or right on time?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: How do you assess when a market is ready?

question_templates.template: Do you have a preference between B2B and B2C companies?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What about B2B2C or marketplace models?

question_templates.template: What's your ideal founder profile? First-time founders or repeat entrepreneurs?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What backgrounds tend to produce the best founders in your experience?

question_templates.template: Do you prefer horizontal platform plays or deep vertical solutions?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: How do you think about the trade-offs between the two?

question_templates.template: When you evaluate a deal, what matters most to you? How would you rank team, market, product, and traction?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: If you had to pick just one thing that makes you lean toward yes, what would it be?

question_templates.template: How does your evaluation framework change based on stage? What matters more at seed vs. Series A?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: At what point does traction become a requirement vs. a nice-to-have?

question_templates.template: What are your deal-breakers? What red flags make you pass immediately?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Any specific founder behaviors or market characteristics that concern you?

question_templates.template: Have you developed any new red flags based on recent experiences?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What patterns have you seen in deals that didn't work out?

question_templates.template: What signals get you really excited? What makes you move faster on a deal?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Can you give me an example from a recent deal you were excited about?

question_templates.template: What's something a founder could say in a first meeting that would make you want to invest immediately?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What's the fastest you've ever gone from first meeting to term sheet?

question_templates.template: How do you evaluate founding teams? What do you look for beyond the resume?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: How do you assess founder-market fit specifically?

question_templates.template: Do you require a technical co-founder for tech companies?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: How do you evaluate non-technical founders building tech products?

question_templates.template: How much does prior founding experience matter to you?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Would you back a first-time founder in a competitive space?

question_templates.template: What revenue or traction metrics do you expect to see at your typical entry point?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: How do you think about user metrics vs. revenue metrics?

question_templates.template: How price sensitive are you? Would you pass on a great company at a high valuation?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What's the maximum pre-money you'd consider at seed stage?

question_templates.template: What cap table red flags do you look out for?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: How much dilution is too much for founders to have taken pre-Series A?

question_templates.template: How do you think about defensibility? What types of moats do you value most?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Between network effects, switching costs, and brand - which matters most at your stage?

question_templates.template: How important is it that a company has a clear moat at the time you invest vs. a path to one?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What's the timeline for moat development that you're comfortable with?

question_templates.template: What's your framework for evaluating network effects? How do you distinguish real from imagined?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What metrics do you look at to measure network effect strength?

question_templates.template: How do you evaluate data moats? What makes data truly defensible?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What's an example of a company with a real data moat?

question_templates.template: How do you assess competitive dynamics? What level of competition is acceptable?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Would you invest in a company entering a market with well-funded incumbents?

question_templates.template: How much weight do you put on patents and IP defensibility?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: In what types of businesses do you think IP matters most?

question_templates.template: How quickly do you expect companies to build defensibility after you invest?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What milestones indicate that a moat is forming?

question_templates.template: Walk me through your typical investment process. What happens after a first meeting?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: How many meetings before you make a decision? Who else gets involved?

question_templates.template: What's your typical timeline from first meeting to term sheet?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What's the fastest you've moved on a deal?

question_templates.template: How does your investment committee work? What does it take to get a deal approved?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Can you sponsor a deal without full partner consensus?

question_templates.template: What does your due diligence process look like? How deep do you go?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Do you do technical diligence in-house or bring in outside experts?

question_templates.template: How do you approach reference checks? What questions do you always ask?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Do you do backdoor references beyond the founder's provided list?

question_templates.template: What are your standard term sheet terms? Any non-negotiables?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: How do you think about pro-rata rights and information rights?

question_templates.template: What does your involvement look like after you invest? Board seat vs. observer?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: How do you add value beyond capital?

question_templates.template: When you pass on a deal, how do you prefer to communicate that to founders?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Do you typically give detailed feedback or keep it brief?

question_templates.template: What's the most respectful way for a founder to handle a rejection from you?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: Do you like founders to follow up after a pass, or is the door closed?

question_templates.template: How do you prefer to meet new companies? Warm intros only or do you look at cold outreach?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What makes a cold email stand out to you?

question_templates.template: What materials do you want to see before a first meeting? Deck, memo, or just a conversation?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What makes a great pitch deck in your view?

question_templates.template: What's your preferred meeting format? Video, in-person, or does it matter?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: How long do you like first meetings to be?

question_templates.template: What should founders expect in terms of response time after a meeting?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: If you're interested, how quickly will a founder hear back?

question_templates.template: How would you describe your relationship philosophy with founders? Hands-on coach or available when needed?
question_templates.follow_up_if_vague: What's the right frequency for portfolio company check-ins?
